subject: Re: Randomly Ordered Repeating Test Suite - YES
msgSnippet: That s funny.  I could swear I uploaded my RandomTestSuite.java here years ago.  I don t see it now -- maybe it was purged.  I ll see if I can put it back. K
messageBody:
That's funny. I could swear I uploaded my RandomTestSuite.java here
years ago. I don't see it now -- maybe it was purged. I'll see if I
can put it back.

K


--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, David Corbin <dcorbin@m...> wrote:
> Is there a addon available that will take a set of tests, and run them
> repeatedly in a random orders until failure (or forcibly stopped).
>
> I've got one tests which fails sporadically, and I cannot figure out
any
> reason for it to be non-deterministic in MY code. I've added some
> logging statements, but It's hard to get to fail.
>
> David
